entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
